Title: Requires the department of labor to provide credit monitoring and identity theft surveillance services to certain individuals whose information may have been disclosed inappropriately
Summary: Requires the department of labor to provide at least five years of credit monitoring and identity theft surveillance services to certain individuals whose information may have been disclosed inappropriately.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the department of labor to provide credit monitoring and identity theft surveillance services to certain individuals whose information may have been disclosed inappropriately
